Lightning Transaction Detection

utility.lightning.lightning_check(tx_input, tx_output, tx_tainted=None, service_adr=None, value_limit=None)[source]

Check if the transactions are potentially lightning_tx transactions

Parameters

  • tx_input – Dataframe containing tx input data.

  • tx_output – Dataframe containing tx output data.

  • tx_tainted – Dataframe for lightning_tx checking.

  • service_adr – Dataframe containing service unrelated to lightning_tx network.

  • value_limit – Optional channel value limit that replace the default.

Returns

Dataframe with public lightning_tx classification.

utility.lightning.pub_lightning_check(tx_tainted, user_agent_list)[source]

Check if found lightning_tx transactions are public or not

Parameters

  • tx_tainted – Dataframe for public checking, require transaction hash value.

  • user_agent_list – List of user agents to improve google automated search prevention.

Returns

Dataframe with public lightning_tx classification.
